lead_paragraph: The family had dinner with Senator Bernie Sanders in Vermont and may take in a game at Fenway Park. But the rest of the itinerary is unknown.

headline.print_headline: Little Fanfare as Mayor and Family Hit the Road
headline.main: Mayor de Blasio Shares Few Details About a Family Vacation

snippet: The family had dinner with Senator Bernie Sanders in Vermont and may take in a game at Fenway Park. But the rest of the itinerary is unknown....
abstract: New York City Mayor Bill de Blasio departs on family road trip around New England with undecided itinerary, giving little notice to staff; few openly begrudge mayor time away during sleepiest week of August, though some offer veiled criticism.
